p: All measurements were performed in triplicate and results expressed as average ± standard deviations. Data were analyzed by ANOVA procedures and means compared with Tukey’s tests with a significance level of p < 0.05 using the Minitab software (V.17.1.0). In the case of CAA, total phenolic and carotenoid Pearson correlations were obtained using the same Minitab software.
